app_desc1: The app was created as a tool to search, write and edit existing entries on Nias Wiktionary at https://nia.wiktionary.org.
app_desc2: It is part of the Nias language development programme (2020-2025). The Nias language enthusiasts had chosen Wikimedia with its various projects (Wikibooks, Wikipedia, Wiktionary etc.) because its free and collaborative nature as well as its contributions to the global effort to make knowledge accessible to everyone.
app_source: See the source code of this app at https://github.com/sslaia/wikikamusnias. Each code contribution matters.
app_task1: The app is written with specific tasks in mind: look up for word definition, creating new entry or editing existing entries in the Nias Wiktionary.
choose_language: Please select the language for the menu:
choose_wiki_project: Please choose the project you want to work on:
close_webview: Close and go back to the start page?
goal: bringing Nias to the digital age
no_back:
No more pages.

no_internet:
Sorry, I can't get the page you wanted. 
There's no internet connection.
wiki_banner_wb: Nias Wikibooks: free books in Nias language.
wiki_banner_wk: Nias Wiktionary: a free dictionary in Nias language.
wiki_banner_wp: Nias Wikipedia: a free ensiklopedia in Nias language.
wikinias_slogan2: Moroi khöda, soguna khöda ba soguna khö ndraonoda miföna
